EmailTemplate.subject: JetWave™ Installation in as Little as 10 Days!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Reduce Time on Ground with Brunswick Aviation Services
Complaints about slow, inconsistent in-flight Wi-Fi service? Experience JetWave™. Powering continuous connectivity, global coverage, and breath-taking speed, it provides you the flexibility to spend your flight linked into your world. You should not have to ground your aircraft for an extended period to get reliable, fast internet.
As a Connectivity Center of Excellence, Brunswick Aviation Services provides efficient, 10-day JetWave installations, getting you back in the air quickly. Once your Global Express jet is upgraded with JetWave, you can connect to Inmarsat’s Ka-band service – Jet ConneX™ - for global, reliable, high-speed Wi-Fi at speeds up to 15 megabits per second.
Stop fighting an unreliable Wi-Fi connection and contact Brunswick Aviation Services today to schedule your JetWave installation.
UPGRADE TO JETWAVE TODAY! <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/Stream-Chat-and-Video-Conference-with-Reliable-In-Flight-Wi-Fi-from-JetWave?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=18_jetwave&utm_content=email2-installationspeed]]>
